attributes.action: Oppose the Children’s Wellbeing and Schools Bill! FOR OUR KIDS FREEDOM
attributes.additional_details: Share and hold this government to account. They are here for the people not to oppress them!
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, oppose the Children’s Wellbeing and Schools Bill. This bill would give local authorities power to override parents on how children are raised and educated. It threatens freedom, family rights, and diverse beliefs. Support trust, not control.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Withdraw the Children's Wellbeing and Schools Bill
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722377
